data.name: asamodule_resources
data.marketing: Shows a property rooms/resources in an ASAModule widget/module. Useful for single property websites.
data.description: Shows a property rooms/resources in an ASAModule widget/module. Use the argument 'asamodule_resources_puid' to set the property uid and 'asamodule_resources_ids' to set what rooms to show.  Alternatively, can be shown through a shortcode.
data.change_log: v1.3 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.4 Remaining globals cleanup and jr_gettext refactor related changes. v1.5 fixed a notice. v1.6 Modified how array contents are checked. v1.7 Shortcode data updated. v1.8 French language file added. v1.9 BS4 template set added v2.0 Language files updated v2.1 Bootstrap 5 template set added. v2.2 Documentation updated.
data.author: Vince Wooll
